EyeDropper.summary: NOTE Experimental The EyeDropper interface represents an instance of an eyedropper tool that can be opened and used by the user to select colors from the screen.

EyeDropperEyeDropper.summary: NOTE Experimental The EyeDropper() constructor returns a new object.

EyeDropperOpen.summary: NOTE Experimental The EyeDropper.open() method starts the eyedropper mode, returning a promise which is fulfilled once the user has selected a color and exited the eyedropper mode.
EyeDropperOpen.returns: A that eventually resolves when the user selects a pixel color from the screen.The promise resolves to an object with the following property:
